tool_description: This API predicts user intents, for customer support domain.
name: User Intent Recognition
title: User Intent Recognition

api_list.name: Intent Recognition
api_list.description: User intent recognition for customer support.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://user-intent-recognition.p.rapidapi.com/intent-recognition"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "user-intent-recognition.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
